lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Thomas L. Friedman (''Today's News Quiz,'' column, Nov. 20) hit the nail on the head in saying democracy is the answer to fundamentalist extremism, anti-American rage and terrorism. People with no other outlets for expressing their objections to the way they are ruled will, of course, resort to armed struggle. Isn't that what we did during the Revolutionary War?
abstract: Pamela Taylor letter on Thomas L Friedman's Nov 20 column backs his call for democracy
